name: Process System Enterprise
overview:
Process Systems Enterprise Limited supplies process modeling software and model-based innovation services to the process industries. It offers gPROMS, a process modeling environment used to generate predictive information for decision support in product and process innovation, design, and operation applications. The company also provides consultancy services, which include advice on modeling strategy, process design and model-based innovation, process model implementation and application, and training and knowledge transfer. In addition, it offers call-off modeling, modeling, process development, and process optimization services. The companyâ€™s products and services are used for various applications, such as reaction, separation, crystallization, fuel cells, biotechnology, batch processing, control and automation, and safety. It serves chemicals, energy, pharma and lifestyle, polymers, food and beverage, industrial gases, pulp and paper, minerals and mining, biotreatment processes, and metals production industries.

Process Systems Enterprise Limited was founded in 1997 and is based in London, the United Kingdom. The company has additional offices in Cedar Knolls, New Jersey; Yokohama, Japan; Daejeon, Korea; and Cologne, Germany, as well as an agency representation in India.

funding_rounds.source_description: PSE funding for gPROMS modelling worldwide expansion
